description:
* A Magic Touch that gives your photo a new life !

Photo Slice helps you to make fantastic photo-arts by slicing and editing existing photos. Slice and reassemble any photo as you want! You can reconstruct a photo or mix multiple photos slice by slice. You can also decorate each slice with 93 Stickers, 14 Frames, Text box, 33 Backgrounds and 29 Filter effects. 

Do this MAGIC to your precious memories; photos of family, your friends, girl-friend, pets, travels and more.

KEY FEATURES

* 4 Ways of slicing photos (From template, Free Style, Grid Style, Random slicing)
* 22 Built-in templates.
* 154 Stickers, 30 Photo Frames.
* 74 Premium Stickers
* Support Photo Stickers with 30 Styles.
* 29 Filter Effects.
* 33 Background images.
* 30 Premium Background.
* Can add TEXTs.
* Can mix multiple photos in one!
* Can make your own templates.
* Can zoom, rotate, position each photo slice.
* Can import/export from/to Camera Roll.
* SNS Sharing: Facebook, Instagram, Tumblr, Flickr, Picasa, Twitter
* Supports sending photos via eMail, SMS.

CONTACT

  If you have any questions or opinions, please let us know.
   email: photoslice@darinsoft.com
trackCensoredName: Photo Slice Pro - Cut your photo into pieces to make great photo collage and pic frame
